resources.string: Welcome to Compastic. This is a little application (beta version) I designed on my spare time. Please be gentle!
Specify a place of interest and Compastic will give you the geographical direction to look at as well as the distance to that place.

A word of caution: compastic is for "fun" only, do not trust the directions in serious situations. The accuracy of results vary greatly with the device, environment and calibration. To calibrate execute an 8 shape with the phone.
Software written by Thomas. Please let me know of suggestions, requests and especially bugs!
The application is in a very beta stage. I will improve it very soon!
